question: A company that makes fences started using a new material instead of wood. The new material will last longer than wood. What is the most likely benefit of the new material?
candidate_answers: (A) The new material will keep people safe. (B) The new material will keep pets contained. (C) The new material can make a yard attractive. (D) The new material can save money on replacements.
answer: The new material will keep people safe.
label: A
